div.p: Relation between [ 210Pb] (μBq m −3) and [SO 4 2−] nmb (ng m −3) at Dome C in 2011. Red circles represent data obtained during October–December, one month before and after the [SO 4 2−] nmb increase in November. Grey circles and dotted line are the case without the highest [SO 4 2−] nmb. Data for other periods are presented as red diamonds.
